comments.author: cygan
comments.body: why are these private keys also offered in the auction?wouldn't it be better to leave them out so that none of the winners would be tempted to use them after all?just my 2 sats

comments.author: Immuzikation
comments.body: Quote from: cygan on November 07, 2022, 06:52:38 PMwhy are these private keys also offered in the auction?wouldn't it be better to leave them out so that none of the winners would be tempted to use them after all?just my 2 sats Why not? It's my auction. lol. Novelty/historical value. "Better" is subjective. If you're going to use a private key that you know that me and Mike, and now minerjones have seen, you deserve to get rekt. Someone retracted their bid when I didn't have them included. I included them, and it's another issue all over again.

comments.body: I am not participating in this auction...but I think getting Mike's private key with the coin is something I would want as a collector....though I would not load of course since it's been exposed to so many people.Â  If I had the means ..I would've loved to have an entire sheet of them as they are probably rare as hell to find. Just mounted that in a frame would be amazing to see.Â  Good luck with the auction!
